letter.title: A PERSONAL LETTER FROM STIVE MARTIN
letter.paragraph: WHAT A PLEASURE IT WAS TO RECEIVE A LETTER FROM YOU. ALTHOUGH MY SCHEDULE IS VERY BUSY, I DECIDED TO TAKE TIME OUT TO WRITE YOUA PERSONAL REPLY.

TOO OFTEN PREFORMERS LOSE CONTACT WITH THEIR AUDIANCE AND BEGINTO TAKE THEM FOR GRANTED, BUT I DON'T THINK THAT WILL EVER HAPPEN TOMI WILL IT JENNY? I DON'T KNOW WHEN I WILL BE APPEARINGCLOSE TO YOU, BUT KEEP THAT EXTRA BUNK MADE UP IN CASE OF I GET TOFLIRT
letter.postscript: I WILL ALWAYS CHERISH THAT AFTERNOON WE SPENT TOGETHER IN RIO,WALKING ALONG THE BEACH, LOOKING AT ROCKS
